ygData.subject: Re: Bank and Farie Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, in addition to all that has been said about fae drakes, let me add my two CP: 1 cp)They tend to swarm! If I ever take one on, I check the surrounding are
ygData.messageBody:
Well, in addition to all that has been said about fae drakes, let me add my
two CP:

1 cp)They tend to swarm! If I ever take one on, I check the surrounding are
very carefully.

2 cp)I don't know if it's Norrath, Karma or the Gods, but I crash about a
third of the time when dealing with Fae Drakes. Sometimes during combat,
sometimes after a kill, sometimes if they're just on my screen! No other
creature has had this effect on me. Has anyone else seen this?

>2. What's up with Farie Dragons? The little guys with butterfly wings.
Are
>they monsters to hunt? Do they have a bad faction adjustment when killed.
Do
>they have good treasure? No one seems to be hunting them. Yes they're
>beautiful but that doesn't seem to stop most people.
